name: Reflex Demo
description:
Welcome to the Reflex Demo. This demo is only for testing purposes, and does not represent the final game. Please send any feedback or report any bugs you find. Thanks!

Reflex is a sci-fi multiplayer laser tag game which imitates a modern laser tag experience just like the ones in real life. Select your character, select your weapon, and deploy into a match and experience a battle like no other. This game features multiple game modes, multiple maps, and multiple characters.

Install Instructions:

Extract the zip file

Open the "Reflex" folder

Open the .exe application
